articles.title: LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky: Skills, Not Degrees, Matter Most in Hiring - HBR.org Daily
articles.description: Ryan Roslansky, the CEO of LinkedIn, thinks the site should be a place where its members’ billions of years of collective work experience should be freed to upskill anyone, anywhere, any time. Skills, more than degrees or pedigrees, are the true measure of wh…

articles.title: Binance chief says crypto exchange doesn’t see viable business in India - TechCrunch
articles.description: "To be honest, I don't think India is a very crypto-friendly environment," said Binance CEO Changpeng "CZ" Zhao.
